Author: GitHub
Description:
Learn why working with branches is essential for keeping your main code safe while you experiment or add new features. This quick tutorial covers the git checkout -b command to create and switch branches in one step. We also show you how to view your list of branches so you never get lost in your repository.

#Git #GitHub #GitHubForBeginners

Title: How to use git branches for beginners
